title: Stained Glass Cookies
directions: Beat together margarine or butter, sugar, honey, egg and vanilla in bowl with mixer until creamy.
Mix in flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Roll dough on a lightly floured surface to ½ inch thickness.
Cut dough into desired shapes with 2½ to 3-inch floured cookie cutters.
Trace a smaller version of cookie shape on dough leaving a ½ to ¾-inch border of dough.
Cut out and remove dough from center of cookies; set aside. Place cut-out shapes on baking sheets lined with foil. Repeat with reserved dough, re-rolling scraps as necessary.
Crush each color of candy separately between two layers of wax paper.
Spoon crushed candy inside centers of cut-out cookie shapes.
Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 6 to 8 minutes or until candy is melted and cookies are lightly browned.
Cool cookies completely before removing from foil.
ingredients: ½ cup margarine or butter, softened
5 rolls Five Flavor or Fancy Fruits LIFE SAVERS candy
